channel.title: [PI] Problem
channel.description:
Hello, I am here with one problem. If I change anything at clickingbutton.java ill getting this error:
[IMG]https://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/667x332q90/661/59ivSO.png[/img]
Maybe someone know, how to fix this editing problem?

item.title: [PI] Problem
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

There’s an illegal character at the top of your file, in the package. Delete it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Make sure you’re saving the file in the correct format.
Right click the Java file, hit edit (so it opens in notepad).
Hit File >Save As.
Under where it has the file name and the save type, it will have the encoding type.
Make sure the encoding is ANSI. Also make sure it is saved as “All Files” otherwise it will save as a .txt

Like so:

Read full topic
